entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
